dict.string: The function of this repo is to provide fake data for test cases.

This is used for logging in the application. Any production application should have robust logging. Swift log takes a lot of the heavy lifting involved in logging and makes use of an easy to use interface `Logging`.

This repository provides a property wrapper for using synchronized swiftui property wrappers with iCloudKit. I started writing this, ran into a small issue with how to best register observers and found this library. Even though I was very close, its best to not reinvent a wheel.
